body_html: Ugh, that doesn’t seem like a very safe thing. You’re basically ignoring undefined behavior in your program (I think of undefined tensors like null pointers). It’s like mapping memory at address 0 to prevent segfaults 😄
body_text: Ugh, that doesn’t seem like a very safe thing. You’re basically ignoring undefined behavior in your program (I think of undefined tensors like null pointers). It’s like mapping memory at address 0 to prevent segfaults 😄
body: Ugh, that doesn’t seem like a very safe thing. You’re basically ignoring undefined behavior in your program (I think of undefined tensors like null pointers). It’s like mapping memory at address 0 to prevent segfaults :smile:
